objects.description: Monitor for the loading of unusual modules or DLLs into processes. Specifically focus on modules that are not typically loaded or associated with IPC mechanisms. Analytic 1 - Unrecognized DLLs. sourcetype=Sysmon EventCode=7 | search module_path != "/usr/lib/*" OR module_path != "/windows/system32/*" OR module_path != "/lib/*" | stats count by module_path process_name user | where module_path IN ("suspicious_modules.dll", "unknown.so")
